Title: Adventureland
Country: USA
USA release: 03/04/2009
Released in Spain: 27/11/2009
Studio: Miramax Films
Director: Greg Mottola
Screenwriter: Greg Mottola
Starring: Jesse Eisenberg, Ryan Reynolds, Kristen Stewart, Martin Starr, Paige Howard

Synopsis:
In the summer of 87, James Brennan (Jesse Eisenberg) has just graduated in high school and is eager to fulfill his dream of traveling to Europe. But then his parents (Wendie Malick and Jack Gilpin) will report that they can not pay the travel and James has no choice but to accept a crappy job at a local amusement park. German beer is over, the world's most famous museums, and French girls-summer James will now be populated by parents unbearable stuffed pandas and screaming children lost cotton candy. However, what should have been the worst summer of his life becomes an adventure in which unexpectedly finds love in a co-worker, Em, (Kristen Stewart), and just discovering that this was the master needed to prepare to enter the real world.
